languages.text: Чудовище, что вернулось с Вольным Торговцем из Комморры, мало чем напоминало прежнего Ахиллеаса Скаландра. В редкие минуты прозрения бывший агент Инквизиции выл диким зверем, моля о смерти, а в минуты буйства свирепо расправлялся с теми, кто был непокорен его хозя{mf|ину|йке}. Со временем разум и плоть чудовища, лишенные инъекций гемункула, начали распадаться, принося нескончаемые страдания. В порыве безумия Ахиллеас прыгнул с высокого шпиля Даргонуса, и его изувеченная душа обрела покой.

The monster that returned with the Rogue Trader from Commorragh bore little resemblance to Achilleas Scalander. In rare moments of clarity, the former Inquisition agent howled like a wounded beast, pleading for death. In moments of frenzy, he violently disposed of anyone who disobeyed his {mf|master|mistress}. As time passed, the body and mind of this monster, deprived of the Haemonculus's injections, began to disintegrate, bringing him unending suffering. In a burst of madness, Achilleas leapt from a high spire on Dargonus, and his crippled soul found peace.
languages.original_text: Чудовище, что вернулось с Вольным Торговцем из Комморры, мало чем напоминало прежнего Ахиллеаса Скаландра. В редкие минуты прозрения бывший агент Инквизиции выл диким зверем, моля о смерти, а в минуты буйства свирепо расправлялся с теми, кто был непокорен его хозя{mf|ину|йке}. Со временем разум и плоть чудовища, лишенные инъекций гемункула, начали распадаться, принося нескончаемые страдания. В порыве безумия Ахиллеас прыгнул с высокого шпиля Даргонуса, и его изувеченная душа обрела покой.

traits.locale_text: The monster that returned with the Rogue Trader from Commorragh, bore little resemblance to the former Achilleas Scalander. In rare moments of clarity, the former Inquisition agent howled like a wounded beast, pleading for death. In moments of frenzy, he violently disposed of anyone who disobeyed his {mf|master|mistress}. As time passed, the body and the mind of this monster, left without Haemonculus injections, started to tear, bringing him unending suffering. In a burst of madness, Achilleas jumped off the high Dargonus spire, and his crippled soul found peace.

In a burst of madness, Achilleas jumped off the high Dargonus spire, and his crippled soul found peace.

In a burst of madness, Achilleas leapt from a high spire of Dargonus, and his crippled soul found peace.

In rare moments of clarity, the former Inquisition agent howled like a wounded beast, pleading for death. In moments of frenzy, he violently disposed of anyone who disobeyed his {mf|master|mistress}. As time passed, the body and mind of this monster, deprived of the Haemonculus's injections, began to disintegrate, bringing him unending suffering. In a burst of madness, Achilleas leapt from a high spire on Dargonus, and his crippled soul found peace.

languages.text: 与行商浪人一起从科摩罗回来的怪物，和阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德已经判若两人。在难得的清醒时刻，这位曾经审判庭特工会像受伤的野兽一样疯狂嚎叫，乞求死亡。而在他发狂的时候，他会粗暴地消灭一切胆敢违逆主人的人。由于失去了血伶人的药物注射，随着时间推移，这只怪物的肉体与心灵开始崩溃，给他带来了无休无止的痛苦。在疯狂之中，阿吉里亚斯从达戈努斯的尖塔上一跃而下，他那破碎的灵魂终于得到了安宁。
languages.original_text: The monster that returned with the Rogue Trader from Commorragh bore little resemblance to Achilleas Scalander. In rare moments of clarity, the former Inquisition agent howled like a wounded beast, pleading for death. In moments of frenzy, he violently disposed of anyone who disobeyed his {mf|master|mistress}. As time passed, the body and mind of this monster, deprived of the Haemonculus's injections, began to disintegrate, bringing him unending suffering. In a burst of madness, Achilleas leapt from a high spire on Dargonus, and his crippled soul found peace.

traits.locale_text: 与行商浪人一起从科摩罗回来的怪物，和阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德已经判若两人。在难得的清醒时刻，这位曾经审判庭特工会像受伤的野兽一样疯狂嚎叫，乞求死亡。而在他发狂的时候，他会粗暴地消灭一切胆敢违逆主人的人。由于失去了血伶人的药物注射，随着时间推移，这只怪物的肉体与心灵开始崩溃，给他带来了无休无止的痛苦。在疯狂之中，阿吉里亚斯从达戈努斯的尖塔上一跃而下，他那破碎的灵魂终于得到了安宁。

languages.text: Das Monster, das mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} aus Commorragh zurückkehrte, hatte kaum mehr Ähnlichkeit mit Achilleas Scalander. In seltenen Augenblicken der Klarheit heulte der ehemalige Agent der Inquisition wie ein verwundetes Tier und flehte, sterben zu dürfen. In Augenblicken der Raserei tötete er jeden, der {mf|seinem Herren|seiner Herrin} widersprach, auf brutale Weise. Mit der Zeit begannen Körper und Verstand dieses Monsters sich aufzulösen, weil ihnen die Injektionen des Haemonculus fehlten. Das brachte ihm unendliches Leid. In einem Anfall des Wahnsinns sprang Achilleas von einem der höchsten Türme in Dargonus, und seine verkrüppelte Seele fand Frieden.
languages.original_text: The monster that returned with the Rogue Trader from Commorragh bore little resemblance to Achilleas Scalander. In rare moments of clarity, the former Inquisition agent howled like a wounded beast, pleading for death. In moments of frenzy, he violently disposed of anyone who disobeyed his {mf|master|mistress}. As time passed, the body and mind of this monster, deprived of the Haemonculus's injections, began to disintegrate, bringing him unending suffering. In a burst of madness, Achilleas leapt from a high spire on Dargonus, and his crippled soul found peace.

traits.locale_text: Das Monster, das mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} aus Commorragh zurückkehrte, hatte kaum mehr Ähnlichkeit mit Achilleas Scalander. In seltenen Augenblicken der Klarheit heulte der ehemalige Agent der Inquisition wie ein verwundetes Tier und flehte, sterben zu dürfen. In Augenblicken der Raserei tötete er jeden, der {mf|seinem Herren|seiner Herrin} widersprach, auf brutale Weise. Mit der Zeit begannen Körper und Verstand dieses Monsters zu zerreißen, weil ihnen die Injektionen des Haemonculus fehlten. Das brachte ihm unendliches Leid. In einem Anfall des Wahnsinns sprang Achilleas von einem der höchsten Türme in Dargonus, und seine verkrüppelte Seele fand endlich Frieden.

languages.text: Le monstre qui était revenu de Commorragh avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ne ressemblait guère à Achilleas Scalander. Dans ses rares éclairs de lucidité, l'ancien agent de l'Inquisition suppliait qu'on le tue en hurlant comme un animal blessé. Dans ses moments de frénésie, il éliminait brutalement quiconque désobéissait à {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}. Sans les injections de l'hémoncule, son corps et son esprit commencèrent à se désintégrer, engendrant des souffrances sans fin. Un jour, pris d'un accès de folie, Achilleas se jeta du haut d'une tour de Dargonus et son âme torturée trouva enfin la paix.
languages.original_text: The monster that returned with the Rogue Trader from Commorragh bore little resemblance to Achilleas Scalander. In rare moments of clarity, the former Inquisition agent howled like a wounded beast, pleading for death. In moments of frenzy, he violently disposed of anyone who disobeyed his {mf|master|mistress}. As time passed, the body and mind of this monster, deprived of the Haemonculus's injections, began to disintegrate, bringing him unending suffering. In a burst of madness, Achilleas leapt from a high spire on Dargonus, and his crippled soul found peace.

traits.locale_text: Le monstre qui était revenu de Commorragh avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ne ressemblait guère à Achilleas Scalander. Dans ses rares éclairs de lucidité, l'ancien agent de l'Inquisition suppliait qu'on le tue en hurlant comme un animal blessé. Dans ses moments de frénésie, il éliminait brutalement quiconque désobéissait à {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}. Sans les injections de l'hémoncule, son corps et son esprit commencèrent à se désagréger, engendrant des souffrances sans fin. Un jour, pris d'un accès de folie, Achilleas se jeta du haut d'une tour de Dargonus et son âme torturée trouva enfin la paix.

languages.text: El monstruo que volvió con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente de Commorragh apenas se parecía a Achilleas Scalander. En sus escasos momentos de lucidez, el antiguo agente de la Inquisición aullaba como un animal herido, suplicando la muerte. En sus momentos de desenfreno, mataba con brutalidad a todo el que desobedeciera a su am{mf|o|a}. Con el tiempo, el cuerpo y la mente del monstruo empezó a desintegrarse sin las inyecciones del Hemónculo, lo que le causó un sufrimiento constante. En un arrebato de locura, Achilleas saltó desde lo alto de una aguja en Dargonus y su alma mutilada por fin encontró la paz.
languages.original_text: The monster that returned with the Rogue Trader from Commorragh bore little resemblance to Achilleas Scalander. In rare moments of clarity, the former Inquisition agent howled like a wounded beast, pleading for death. In moments of frenzy, he violently disposed of anyone who disobeyed his {mf|master|mistress}. As time passed, the body and mind of this monster, deprived of the Haemonculus's injections, began to disintegrate, bringing him unending suffering. In a burst of madness, Achilleas leapt from a high spire on Dargonus, and his crippled soul found peace.

traits.locale_text: El monstruo que volvió con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente de Commorragh apenas se parecía a Achilleas Scalander. En sus escasos momentos de lucidez, el antiguo agente de la Inquisición aullaba como un animal herido, suplicando la muerte. En sus momentos de desenfreno, mataba con brutalidad a todo el que desobedeciera a su am{mf|o|a}. Con el tiempo, el cuerpo y la mente del monstruo empezó a desgarrarse sin las inyecciones del Hemónculo, lo que le causó un sufrimiento constante. En un arrebato de locura, Achilleas saltó desde lo alto de una aguja en Dargonus y su alma mutilada por fin encontró la paz.

languages.text: コモラフから自由開拓者とともに戻ってきた怪物は、アキレアス・スカランダーとは似ても似つかないものだった。元異端審問官は、まれに明晰な瞬間、傷ついた獣のように吠え、死を懇願した。狂乱の内は、主に逆らう者を容赦なく処分した。時間が経つにつれ、ハモンキュラス注射を奪われたこの怪物の肉体と精神は崩壊し始め、終わりのない苦しみをもたらした。狂気の爆発でアキレアスはダルゴナスのそびえ立つ尖塔から飛び降り、彼の不自由な魂は安らぎを得た。
languages.original_text: The monster that returned with the Rogue Trader from Commorragh bore little resemblance to Achilleas Scalander. In rare moments of clarity, the former Inquisition agent howled like a wounded beast, pleading for death. In moments of frenzy, he violently disposed of anyone who disobeyed his {mf|master|mistress}. As time passed, the body and mind of this monster, deprived of the Haemonculus's injections, began to disintegrate, bringing him unending suffering. In a burst of madness, Achilleas leapt from a high spire on Dargonus, and his crippled soul found peace.

traits.locale_text: コモラフからローグトレーダーとともに戻ってきた怪物は、アキレアス・スカランダーとは似ても似つかないものだった。元異端審問官は、まれに明晰な瞬間、傷ついた獣のように吠え、死を懇願した。狂乱の内は、主に逆らう者を容赦なく処分した。時間が経つにつれ、ハモンキュラス注射を奪われたこの怪物の肉体と精神は破裂し始め、終わりのない苦しみをもたらした。狂気の爆発でアキレアスはダルゴナスのそびえ立つ尖塔から飛び降り、彼の不自由な魂は安らぎを得た。

languages.text: Commorragh'tan Hür Tacir'le birlikte gelen yaratık, artık Achilleas Scalander'e pek benzemiyordu. Eski Engizisyon ajanı, zihnindeki perdelerin aralandığı nadir anlarda yaralı bir hayvan gibi uludu ve ölmek için yalvardı. Çılgınlığının arttığı anlarda ise her kim olursa olsun, efendisine itaat etmeyen herkesi vahşice katletti. Haimonkulus'un enjeksiyonlarından mahrum kalan yaratık; zaman geçtikçe bedenen ve zihnen çürümeye, sonu gelmez bir ızdırap içinde kıvranmaya başladı. Deliliğinin arşa çıktığı anlardan birinde Achilleas, Dargonus'un en yüksek kulelerinden birine çıkıp kendini aşağı bıraktı. Böylelikle sakat ruhu nihayet huzur buldu.
languages.original_text: The monster that returned with the Rogue Trader from Commorragh bore little resemblance to Achilleas Scalander. In rare moments of clarity, the former Inquisition agent howled like a wounded beast, pleading for death. In moments of frenzy, he violently disposed of anyone who disobeyed his {mf|master|mistress}. As time passed, the body and mind of this monster, deprived of the Haemonculus's injections, began to disintegrate, bringing him unending suffering. In a burst of madness, Achilleas leapt from a high spire on Dargonus, and his crippled soul found peace.

traits.locale_text: Commorragh'tan Hür Tacir'le birlikte gelen yaratık, artık Achilleas Scalander'e pek benzemiyordu. Eski Engizisyon ajanı, zihnindeki perdelerin aralandığı nadir anlarda yaralı bir hayvan gibi uludu ve ölmek için yalvardı. Çılgınlığının arttığı anlarda ise her kim olursa olsun, efendisine itaat etmeyen herkesi vahşice katletti. Haimonkulus'un enjeksiyonlarından mahrum kalan yaratık, zaman geçtikçe bedenen ve zihnen çürümeye, sonu gelmez bir ızdırap içinde kıvranmaya başladı. Deliliğinin arşa çıktığı anlardan birinde Achilleas, Dargonus'un en yüksek kulelerinden birine çıkıp kendini aşağı bıraktı ve sakat ruhu nihayet huzur buldu.
